entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Igloolik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:16 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -43.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Igloolik Airport 9:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
Temperature: -43.7°C
Pressure: 101.0 kPa
Humidity: 63 %
Wind Chill: -60
Dewpoint: -47.9°C
Wind: NNE 19 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 45.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming north 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 45. Wind chill minus 54 this evening and minus 62 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 38.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind north 20 km/h. High minus 38. Wind chill minus 60 in the morning and minus 53 in the afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind north 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill near minus 53. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 20 February 2023
